summary: A scheming blonde seduces a fighter and convinces him to murder her husband, a fight manager.
cast: Barbara Payton|Frederick Valk|John Slater|Sidney James|Tony Wright|Marie Burke|Selma Vaz Dias|Enzo Coticchia|Chris Adcock|John Brooking|Roy Cattouse|Jimmy Charters|Tom Clegg|Fred Davis|Bettina Dickson|Fred Machon|Ralph Moss|Jim O'Brady|Joe Quigley|Jack Sharp|Bob Simmons|Ian Wilson|George Woodbridge
title: The Flanagan Boy
